name: CEO Search India
description: CEO Search India is a premium firm that assists organisations in acquiring CEOs and board level executives. We have over three decades of experience in identifying and hiring just the right talent for different types of companies. We service a range of clients – from small, owner-driven firms to transnational public listed companies – and we make sure each customer is a delighted one at the end of the assignment. In fact, assignments often grow into life-long relationships between our firm and our customers. In the last three decades, clients have retained us for about 900 CEO searches; pan India as well as globally. Our consultants and employees have put in over 800,000 man hours finding the right candidate for a given job, meeting clients' expectations effectively. We understand several industries in depth and are in sync with the current needs of these sectors. Our goal is to help build strong organisations, irrespective of the industry verticals they may operate in. The key reason for our success has been our ability to be a trusted advisor in the area of Executive Search for our clients, our faith in the strength and diligence of our process and our deep network that spans the country and continents in our area of specialisation.
features: We believe that a strong leader is the first requirement for a company to grow and sustain that growth
We specialize in not only identifying the most suitable CEO for a given organization but also help with other board level appointments

We handhold our CEOs till they are able to deliver significant value to the stakeholder, often acting as the bridge between the business and the stakeholders to iron out any expectation differences that may exist
